key.name: triggers
key.description: The characters and keywords that trigger the extension in the activities view. Comma-separated values. Spaces are ignored.

key.name: search-url
key.description: The URL to which the search terms are going to be added. Change to use another search engine.

key.name: icon-path
key.summary: The path to the extension icon
key.description: The path to the icon to show in the activities view. Leave it blank to use default icon. Best results are obtained using svg images, E.g: /usr/share/icons/*/scalable/*/*.svg.
